name: Win-Win App, Inc.
description: Developer of a sports gaming platform intended to help raise funds for charitable trusts while supporting fantasy football tournaments. The company's technology has a ticketing application for users to buy tickets for fantasy sports, raise funds, and choose and pitch for their favorite athletes, enabling sports lovers to support sports for social good.
